from CARRIER
order by ${orderByClause}

update CARRIER
CARRIER_ID = #{record.carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORED_TIME = #{record.storedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_STATE = #{record.carrierState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
